definition: buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: We had a great response to our buy -one-get -one-free offer.
sentences.chinese: 我們買一送一的方案得到非常良好的反應。

sentences.english: The self-brewing beer buy one get one free during the activity.
sentences.chinese: 活動期間，自釀啤酒買一送一。

sentences.english: The most common form is buy one, get one free.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的形式就是“買一送一”。

sentences.english: I bought toothpaste during a buy-one-get-one-free sale .
sentences.chinese: 我在買一送一的特價時買了牙膏。

sentences.english: And it criticises "buy one, get one free" promotions for their tendency to lead to waste.
sentences.chinese: 它還批評“買一送一”加劇了消費者的浪費傾向。

sentences.english: We're having a buy one get one free sale today.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天有買一送一的優惠哦。

sentences.english: Autumn suits new listing, summer on big sale, buy one get free offer.
sentences.chinese: 英語秋裝上市，夏裝大甩賣，買一送一。

definition: take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
the full amount/to fulfill the quota
snow skin mooncake (with a soft casing which is not baked, instead of the traditional baked pastry casing)
(computing) double pinyin (input method where the user types no more than two keystrokes per character, one for the initial and one for the final)
